item.title: About Adno
item.description: Adno is led by the Espace Mend√®s France a center for scientific, technical and industrial culture located in Poitiers and which operates throughout the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region (France). It is developing in partnership with Abbey of Saint-Savin-sur-Gartempe and the valley of frescoes, the Biblioth√®que Sainte-Genevi√®ve, Paris, the Cit√© internationale de la bande dessin√©e et de l’image, Angoul√™me, the Museums of Poitiers, the Natural History Museum of La Rochelle. Adno was selected as one of the sixteen winners of the 2022 edition of the call for innovative digital services projects by the french Ministry of Culture.

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: An online service # The easiest way to get started is to use the online service. It is free and does not require registration. You can also start with an example. Get started! Examples As Adno is free software, you can also install it for yourself and others. The sources and installation instructions are available on Github. üëâ Adno is under development, its features and interface are subject to change. Start a project # The Adno home screen is divided into three areas.
